data.title: Watch Proxima - The Last Sci-Fi Movie
data.meta_description: Science fiction from Spain - a label often linked with underground director Carlos Atanes. In PROXIMA, Atanes again blurs the boundaries between cinematic reality and fiction. In recent years, his films have found a fan base that extends far beyond Spain, becoming cult films for their experimental and grotesque character.
